# Canadian Balls

## Ingredients

* 1 cup margarine
* 2 cups sifted flour
* 5 Tbs sugar
* 1 cup nuts, finely chopped
* 1 tsp vanilla

## Instructions

Cream margarine and work in the rest of hte ingredients. Chill 2 hours. Shape ito balls about hte size of walnuts and re-chill. Bake 15-18 minutes at 440&deg;F until the bottoms are light brown. Roll in powdered sugar.
